seo.title: qHaul - Transport Management System
seo.description: End-to-end transport management system for haulage operators. Job booking, driver apps, real-time tracking, and automated invoicing.

hero.title: Complete control over your transport operations —
hero.description: End-to-end transport management system for haulage operators. Job booking, driver apps, real-time tracking, and automated invoicing built for the demands of modern logistics.

features.title: Job Management
features.description: Book, schedule, and manage transport jobs with full customer and load details. Track every job from request to completion.

features.title: Smart Dispatch
features.description: Intelligent job assignment based on driver availability, location, and vehicle capacity. Optimize routes automatically.

features.title: Customer Portal
features.description: Self-service portal for customers to book jobs, track deliveries in real-time, and access their complete job history.

features.title: Rate Management
features.description: Flexible rate cards for different customers, routes, and cargo types. Automatic pricing calculations on job creation.

features.title: Load Planning
features.description: Plan and optimize vehicle loads with weight and dimension tracking. Ensure compliance and maximize efficiency.

features.title: Multi-Drop Routes
features.description: Create complex multi-stop routes with optimized sequencing. Track each delivery point independently.

features.title: Job Details On-The-Go
features.description: Drivers see all job details, customer info, and special instructions. Everything they need in their pocket.

features.title: Navigation Integration
features.description: Built-in navigation with traffic-aware routing. One tap to start directions to pickup or delivery locations.

features.title: Digital POD Capture
features.description: Electronic proof of delivery with signature capture, photo documentation, and timestamp verification.

features.title: Status Updates
features.description: Real-time status updates from drivers. Office and customers always know exactly where jobs are.

features.title: Live Vehicle Tracking
features.description: Real-time GPS tracking of your entire fleet. See exactly where every vehicle is at any moment.

features.title: ETA Predictions
features.description: Accurate arrival time predictions based on traffic, distance, and historical data. Keep customers informed.

features.title: Geofence Alerts
features.description: Automatic notifications when vehicles enter or leave designated areas. Track arrivals and departures automatically.

features.title: Customer Tracking Links
features.description: Share live tracking links with customers so they can monitor their deliveries in real-time.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose qHaul?
whyChoose.subtitle: Built for Haulage,
whyChoose.subtitleLine2: By People Who Know the Road.
whyChoose.description: qHaul was designed from the ground up for Irish and UK haulage companies. We understand the challenges of transport management — the constant communication, the paperwork, the pressure to deliver on time. qHaul eliminates the chaos and gives you complete control.

benefits.text: Cut admin time by automating job booking and invoicing
Keep drivers connected with a purpose-built mobile app
Integrate with your accounting software and telematics
Improve customer satisfaction with real-time visibility
